Class CrosswordIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • CrosswordIO

  • public class CrosswordIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the methods needed in order to read or write a crossword to a file, either a .crossword file or a .xml file.
    Author:
    Daniel
